meanings.definition: A condition in which the parathyroid glands produce insufficient amounts of parathyroid hormone.
meanings.sent1: Hypoparathyroidism can cause problems with calcium levels in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed her with hypoparathyroidism after running tests.
meanings.sent3: When the parathyroid glands go on strike, hypoparathyroidism throws a party.
meanings.sent4: In a garden of hormones, hypoparathyroidism is the wilted flower.
meanings.sent5: The word 'hypoparathyroidism' sounds like a complicated dance move.

meanings.definition: The medical condition characterized by low levels of parathyroid hormone in the body.
meanings.sent1: She experienced muscle cramps due to hypoparathyroidism.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the symptoms of hypoparathyroidism to the patient.
meanings.sent3: Hypoparathyroidism decided to take a vacation right before the big exam.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of hormones, hypoparathyroidism is the quiet wave.
meanings.sent5: The image of hypoparathyroidism stuck in her mind like a stubborn sticker.
